label: 参勤交代
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: Alternate attendance and residence system; the requirement that daimyo reside periodically in Edo (generally every other year) and that their legal wives, immediate heirs, and appropriate retinues of service personnel remain in the city at all times
